details: A remarkable remedy for many forms of chronic nasal and bronchial catarrh. Acne. Amaurosis.

Respiratory: Respiration difficult, pressure in bronchi, with constriction
Tough mucus in bronchi and larynx
Pneumonia, when hepatization occurred and resolution failed to take place
Winter coughs, patient is sore all over
Increased mucus with fullness in bronchi
Congestion of upper lobe of left lung
Nose: Increased secretion in nose and throat

name: Antimonium sulphuratum auratum
